article.Heading: Market sell-off may continue until Budget: Deven Choksey
article.Summary: Deven Choksey, KRChoksey Investment Managers, says the retail sector is muted and not seeing any sell-off.
article.Body:
Despite the positive global cues, an unclear Budget picture is possibly spooking the Indian equity market, bringing Nifty below 7000 mark in the intra-day trading, says Deven Choksey, KRChoksey Investment Managers.

However, retail sector is muted and not seeing any sell-off, Choksey tells CNBC-TV18. In the midcap space, he says some of the stocks are falling badly largely because of the collateral damage in the mutual funds portfolio and positions investors have in them.

Watch video for more
